trans-unit.source: Enables notification to a host application that a modal dialog is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer varsling til en vert-applikasjon en modal dialogboks vises.

trans-unit.source: Some applications that host designers need to be notified when a modal dialog box has been invoked.
trans-unit.target: Noen programmer som vert utviklere skal varsles når en modal dialogboks er startet.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio is an example of such a host.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio er et eksempel på en slik vert.

trans-unit.source: The IModalService interface provides an interface to communicate the current modal status.
trans-unit.target: Grensesnittet IModalService gir et grensesnitt som viser gjeldende modal status.

trans-unit.source: The Windows Workflow Designer calls the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.IModalService.SetModalState%2A> method.
When the `isModal` parameter is set to `true`, the host is notified that a modal dialog is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Når den `isModal` parameteren er satt til `true`, verten varsles modal dialogboks vises.

trans-unit.source: If a host application does not care about the modal status, you need not use the service.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et vertsnavn-program ikke bryr deg om modal statusen, må du ikke bruke tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: In the current implementation, if a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) message box (which is a modal dialog) is invoked, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.IModalService.SetModalState%2A>is not called.
trans-unit.target: I den gjeldende implementeringen, hvis en Windows presentasjon Foundation (WPF) meldingsboks (som en modal dialogboks) startes, den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.IModalService.SetModalState%2A>ikke kalles.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.IModalService.SetModalState%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the host application requires this information, another workaround must be created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis vertsprogrammet krever denne informasjonen, må du opprette en annen løsning.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the host application that a modal dialog is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: Varsler vertsprogrammet som en modal dialogboks vises.

trans-unit.source: If set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, a modal dialog is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, vises som en modal dialogboks.
